title: Come support my stream have a laugh maybe learn something

embed.description: talon games master the blade much

body:
Just started up streaming so sort of new to the entertainment  buisness but trying to keep a 4pm to 11pm regular at least once over friday to sunday of each weekend (juggling qork girlfriend and house hold responsibilities doesn't leave much time).  Come have a look tell me if you like it or not and why if you have the time. 
If your a streamer as well just starting would happily host you if you host me every  time im not on or vis versa.
Good luck on the rift cya round.
